oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |han=kass'o remarks on the story 'The death of the !kau' (kochelman, or Agama lizard): he says that the !khau had been on his way to the red sandhills because he wanted to live near to the shallow pools (called !kaugen |ka |ka) found there. 1) pp.7209v-7212v: see How |han=kass'o's pet leveret was killed, 2) See also The death of the !kau (a lizard of the genus Agama), 3) This story is found in Book VIII-14.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Remarks by |han=kass'o on the preceding story (The death of the !kau)
